title: Old Cycle Cigarettes Flatened Cigarette Box For Sale
author: canjond

posts.post_title: Old Cycle Cigarettes Flatened Cigarette Box For Sale
posts.post_content:
For sale is this late 1890s, early 1900s flattened Cycle cigarettes box.  The box has been has light tape on the front and tape on the back as well.  It is does not date to the T206 distribution, but is similar and style (and identical in graphics) to those used.  Cycle cigarette boxes are pretty darn rare.  $40.00 shipped.

[IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/Cycle.jpg[/IMG]

Hey Jon.... I will take this if it is still available...


Thanks,
Dan

[url]dcollins@rentechsolutions.com[/url]

Dan - email sent.  Good to hear from you.

- Jon
